WorkItem.Description:
Remove version number requirement.

Change test according to that.

Re-code EncoderBase.Encode method. It should contain following step.

1. Require input content, mode, encoding string.

2. Use GetDataBits to encode content.

3. Use result from GetDataBits and use VersionControl function to find proper version.

4. Generate header and add databits from GetDataBits after.

5. Return proper struct class contain Bitlist for header + databits and also error correction block info from version.

 

Also consider next terminator step. Whether implement inside Encode method or create separate one.
